metadata.title: CVE-2024-36901 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ipv6:prevent NULL dereference in ip6_output() According to syzbot, there is achance that ip6_dst_idev() returns NULL in ip6_output(). Most places inIPv6 stack deal with a NULL idev just fine, but not here. syzbot reported:general protection fault, probably for non-canonical address0xdffffc00000000bc: 0000 [#1] PREEMPT SMP KASAN PTI
